comment: Not again! Praying for soldiers and families.

comment: Two reliable sources confirm several more shots fired in the East Block on Parliament Hill, just now.
amr:
# ::snt Two reliable sources confirm several more shots fired in the East Block on Parliament Hill, just now.
(c / confirm-01
      :ARG0 (s / source
            :quant 2
            :ARG1-of (r / rely-01
                  :ARG1-of (p / possible-01)))
      :ARG1 (f / fire-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / shot
                  :quant (s3 / several)
                  :mod (m / more))
            :location (b / building
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "East"
                        :op2 "Block")
                  :location (g / government-organization
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Parliament"
                              :op2 "Hill")))
            :time (n3 / now
                  :mod (j / just))))

# ::snt omg hope !!!!!!
